BattleCardAbility.Desc: [Combat Start] If target is the Vermilion Cross, give him 3 Strength and Protection
[On Hit] Give 3 Strength and Endurance to all other allies
All Speed dice of the character lose 3 Speed while this page is in use
If this page hits an enemy, use it again on another random enemy. (Does not re-target already hit enemies)
If any Counter dice from this page remain by the end of the Scene, Elena becomes untargetable for the next Scene
[On Use] All dice on this page gain +2 Power
[On Hit] Recover HP equal to the amount of damage dealt
